description: Markdown preview with Mermaid diagrams, KaTeX math, Marp slides, MDX, code execution, and 20+ diagram languages via Kroki — built for the AI era

config.configPath.description: Restart is required after changes. The global configuration directory path.
config.breakOnSingleNewLine.description: In Markdown, a single newline character doesn't cause a line break in the generated HTML. In GitHub Flavored Markdown, that is not true. Enable this config option to insert line breaks in rendered HTML for single newlines in Markdown source.
config.scrollSync.description: Automatic scroll sync. This is now partially supported.
config.liveUpdate.description: Re-render the preview as the contents of the source changes, without requiring the source buffer to be saved. If disabled, the preview is re-rendered only when the buffer is saved to disk.
config.liveUpdateDebounceMs.description: Debounce time in milliseconds for live updates.
config.previewMode.description:
- **Single Preview**: Only one preview will be shown for all editors.
- **Multiple Previews**: Multiple previews will be shown. Each editor has its own preview.
- **Previews Only**: No editor will be shown. Only previews will be shown.

Restart is required after changes.
config.automaticallyShowPreview.descript: Automatically show preview of markdown being edited.
config.disableAutoPreviewForUriSchemes.d: A list of URI schemes (e.g., `vscode-notebook-cell`) to exclude from the `automaticallyShowPreviewOfMarkdownBeingEdited` feature.
config.previewColorScheme.enumDescriptio: Follow system color scheme. The preview theme will automatically switch between light and dark variants.
Use the same theme as the editor (light or dark).
config.enableTypographer.description: Enable smartypants and other sweet transforms.
config.mathRenderingOption.description: Choose the Math expression rendering method here. You can also disable math rendering if you want by choosing 'None'.
config.mathInlineDelimiters.description: Use customized Math expression inline delimiters.
config.mathBlockDelimiters.description: Use customized Math expression block delimiters.
config.mathjaxV3ScriptSrc.description: MathJax v3 script source. Leave it empty to use the default CDN.
config.enableLinkify.description: Enable or disable conversion of URL-like text to links in the markdown preview.
config.useGitHubStylePipedLink.descripti: If checked, we use GitHub style piped wiki links, i.e. [[linkText|wikiLink]]. Otherwise, we use [[wikiLink|linkText]] as the original Wikipedia style.
config.wikiLinkTargetFileExtension.descr: The file extension for the link in wikilink if the link does not have an extension.
The case for the file name in wikilink.
config.mermaidAsciiMode.description: Render mermaid diagrams as ASCII/Unicode text art instead of SVG
config.codeBlockTheme.description: Code block theme. If `auto` is chosen, then the code block theme that best matches the current preview theme will be picked.
config.previewTheme.description: Preview Theme — sets the color palette for markdown preview. Each theme includes both light and dark variants.
config.previewTheme.enumDescription.1: Obsidian — Purple accent, inspired by Obsidian notes
config.previewTheme.enumDescription.2: Vue — Green accent, inspired by Vue.js docs
config.previewTheme.enumDescription.3: Lark — Clean blue, inspired by Feishu/Lark docs
config.previewTheme.enumDescription.4: Smartblue — Vivid blue accent with grid background
config.previewTheme.enumDescription.7: Dracula — Popular dark with purple/cyan accents
config.previewTheme.enumDescription.9: One Dark — Atom editor dark colors
config.imageFolderPath.description: When using Image Helper to copy images, by default images will be copied to root image folder path '/assets'
config.hideDefaultVSCodeMarkdownPreviewB: Hide the default VSCode markdown preview extension buttons. Restarting the editor is required to make this config take effect.
config.markdownFileExtensions.descriptio: Markdown file extensions. This is used to determine whether to show the preview button in the markdown file context menu.
config.enablePreviewZenMode.description: Enable this option will hide unnecessary UI elements in preview unless your mouse is over it.
config.showPageToolbar.description: Show a floating toolbar at the top-right of the preview for quick access to page tools (TOC, themes, refresh, etc.).
config.markdownOpenMode.description:
Default mode when opening Markdown files.
- **edit**: Editor only
- **preview**: Preview only
- **side-by-side**: Editor + Preview side by side
Open markdown files in editor only
Open markdown files in preview only
Open markdown files with editor and preview side by side
config.enableScriptExecution.description: Enable script execution for code chunks. **WARNING: This allows running arbitrary code.** Only enable if you trust the markdown files you open.
config.codeChunkDefaultShell.description: Default shell for code chunk execution (e.g., bash, zsh, powershell). Leave empty to use system default.
config.latexEngine.description: LaTeX engine for rendering LaTeX code chunks.
config.codeChunkExecutionTimeout.descrip: Timeout in milliseconds for code chunk execution.
